verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. Out of the depths <WH4615> have I cried <WH7121> <WH8804> unto thee, O YY <WH3068>.
YY <WH136>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my voice <WH6963>: let thine ears <WH241> be attentive <WH7183> to the voice <WH6963> of my supplications <WH8469>.
If thou, YY <WH3050>, shouldest mark <WH8104> <WH8799> iniquities <WH5771>, O YY <WH136>, who shall stand <WH5975> <WH8799> ?
But there is forgiveness <WH5547> with thee, that thou mayest be feared <WH3372> <WH8735>.
I wait <WH6960> <WH8765> for the YY <WH3068>, my soul <WH5315> doth wait <WH6960> <WH8765>, and in his word <WH1697> do I hope <WH3176> <WH8689>.
My soul <WH5315> waiteth for the YY <WH136> more than they that watch <WH8104> <WH8802> for the morning <WH1242>: I say, more than they that watch <WH8104> <WH8802> for the morning <WH1242>.
Let Yisra'EL <WH3478> hope <WH3176> <WH8761> in the YY <WH3068>: for with the YY <WH3068> there is mercy <WH2617>, and with him is plenteous <WH7235> <WH8687> redemption <WH6304>.
And he shall redeem <WH6299> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> from all his iniquities <WH5771>.
